Welcome to **Real World Data Science**, a new project from the [Royal Statistical Society](https://rss.org.uk/), in partnership with the [American Statistical Association](https://www.amstat.org/). We bring together data science students, practitioners, leaders, and educators to share knowledge, learn from, and be inspired by real-world applications of data science.

## In academia, the bias in favor of positive findings is well-documented. But, in an applied setting, where results matter more than publication criteria, negative findings can falsify erroneous assumptions, bring unknown problems to light, and prompt the creation of new processes and tools. In this context, a failure is only truly a failure if nothing is learned from it.
Noah Wright on 'learning from failure'
